nodes.text: Khuteb was a colonial backwater located in the Tion Hegemony of the Outer Rim Territories, where sanitation stations were considered to be rare. In 3 ABY, the former Imperial governor Everi Chalis asked the Rebel Alliance First Sergeant Hazram Namir if he was from a backwater in the Tion Hegemony like Khuteb or Promencius Four based on his dialect. The First Sergeant replied that he was from a Tionese world, which Chalis later learned was called Crucival.
Khuteb was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
